column1: Baby Barnaby's////Baby Barnaby's is hands down the best breakfast in Houston! I mean seriously yum-o! I work at Sweet Lola Yogurt Bar
column2: and every week the ladies and I have a meeting and we ALWAYS get the breakfast tacos and burritos to share! Moreover I am quite literally addicted to the fresh squeezed orange juice that they have here
column3: you can NOT get anything near this juice at a store
column4: SO SOOOO GOOD! I have also taken boyfriend and roommate here and we've tried the breakfast plates that have more traditional breakfast foods like eggs
column7: and biscuits... they are phenomenal! So fresh
column8: so healthy [if you make good decisions]
column9: and the best way to start your morning!
